original_text: Abraham looked up and saw three men standing nearby. When he saw them, he hurried from the entrance of his tent to meet them and bowed low to the ground.
korean_text: 눈을 들어 본즉 사람 셋이 맞은편에 서 있는지라 그가 그들을 보자 곧 장막 문에서 달려나가 영접하며 몸을 땅에 굽혀

sentences.original_text: and saw three men standing nearby
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 가까이 서 있는 세 남자를 보았습니다

sentences.original_text: he hurried from the entrance of his tent
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신의帐篷 입구에서 서둘러 나왔습니다

sentences.original_text: and bowed low to the ground
